It has come to our attention that some of our visitors today were disappointed with the amount of trucks and vehicles at the Touch-A-Truck portion of our event. We are so sorry to hear this! We had about 30 trucks and vehicles lined up to participate, but as most of you are probably aware, the weather for today was predicted to be filled with rain and thunderstorms. Although our event was rain or shine, at least 10 of our trucks cancelled at the last minute and some, including the race car that was scheduled, never showed up at all. In addition, three of the trucks/vehicles had to leave early for other commitments. For this reason, at about 2:45pm, the decision was made to allow visitors arriving after that time to enjoy the STEAM Expo and the remaining trucks at a reduced rate of $5 per person.

We received a lot of positive feedback about the overall event but we have also heard your input on things that we need to improve. We value ALL feedback and will use it to help us make these events better in the future. Thank you.
